intent_atoms.description: The ISOInspector App target must integrate NestedA11yIDs with rooted identifiers for the parse tree explorer.
Provide documentation outlining usage conventions and migration plan for NestedA11yIDs integration.
Documentation file Docs/Guides/NestedA11yIDsIntegration.md must be added.
Follow-up puzzles for research log previews and annotation notes must be captured via @todo entries and todo.md.
Extend movie header parsing to surface next_track_ID payload data.
Movie header parsing must support extracting and displaying next_track_id.

functional_units.name: NestedA11yIDs Integration
functional_units.description: Integrates NestedA11yIDs into ISOInspector App target providing rooted identifiers for the parse tree explorer.

functional_units.name: Documentation for NestedA11yIDs Usage
functional_units.description: Provides documentation outlining usage conventions and migration plan for NestedA11yIDs integration.

functional_units.name: Research Log Previews Capture
functional_units.description: Captures follow-up puzzles for research log previews and annotation notes via @todo entries and todo.md.

functional_units.name: Movie Header Parsing Extension
functional_units.description: Extends movie header parsing to surface next_track_ID payload data.

functional_units.name: App Detail Payload Annotations Restoration
functional_units.description: Restores app detail payload annotations, enabling B6 registry integration tests.
